modShortDescription: This mod adds two new itemModifiers: 1. modBleeding - Modification of bleeding 2. modFrog - Dive Modification.
modDescription:
This mod adds two new itemModifiers

1. modBleeding – Modification of bleeding
2. modFrog – Dive Modification

The first adds 50% chance of bleeding to zombies and animals, only installs on bows and crossbows, ideal for hunting lovers.

The second adds %? resistance underwater, only installs on helmets, ideal for diving lovers.

The scheme of both is only for looteo.

**[Download](http://www.mediafire.com/file/8kayllojkrnehl7/GK_2_Mods_A19.rar/file)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/20168-gouki%C2%B4s-a19-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Gouki](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/gouki/)
